attributes.action: Force all UK Football Clubs with Revenue Greater than £1m have 51% Fan Ownership
attributes.additional_details: In the light of the most recent attack on UK football with the biggest clubs trying to start a monopoly in the form of a European Super League government intervention is needed.
attributes.background:
Any football club with a revenue greater than £1m should have the majority of its shares be fan owned.

This will involve any majority shareholders forced to sell their shares until 51% of fans own them.

This is in order to bring back the beautiful games to the fans.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/583310
